# kVTCompressionPropertyKey_YCbCrMatrix

**Global Variable**

The YCbCr matrix for compressed content.

## Declaration

```swift
let kVTCompressionPropertyKey_YCbCrMatrix: CFString
```

## Discussion

If the video encoder enforces specific colorimetry, this property will be read-only ([doc://com.apple.videotoolbox/documentation/VideoToolbox/VTSessionSetProperty(_:key:value:)] will return [doc://com.apple.videotoolbox/documentation/VideoToolbox/kVTPropertyReadOnlyErr]). The value is set on the format description for output sample buffers.
